channel.title: Omg i getted uh ideuh
channel.description:
Like I said, I got an idea.
Basically I was thinking something could be shipped around the world and people from MITB could sign it and put a message on it.
I got the idea from Casey. with his post about Bebe's Mopar Box -
[quote="Casey., post:27, topic:125907"]Send it to all the staff, have them autograph, then put it up for auction. U make lots of money.[/quote]
Then when it's been shipped to everyone that wanted to do it it'd have several pictures taken and stickied or put somewhere dominant on MITB.
Anyone think it's a good idea? Also, what should the object be? It could just be box with a bunch of paper in it, or Bebe's Mopar Box maybe?

item.title: Omg i getted uh ideuh
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“gokon, post:83, topic:126198”][quote author=Aftermath link=topic=176458.msg1622025#msg1622025 date=1185173157]
I’d sell it saying that ‘lawl /dumpload on it’

IM COMIN!!
IM COMIN!!
IM COMIN ON YOU!!

I call the front cover.

In Soviet Russia, notebook ejaculates on you.
[/quote]i cant believe no one caught this family guy reference. but thats beside the point. i love this idea. bebe and waffen combined have thought of the best way to get this thign around. staff first, going in the country order that waffen said, then the users who can be trusted in reverse country order(this is because it would be wasteful to send it from the end all the way back to europe.[/quote]

be quiet!

Casey me and silab should start. were cooler.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg i getted uh ideuh
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:67, topic:126198”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=176458.msg1623174#msg1623174 date=1185222044]

but this idea would then mean we all have to give out our addresses… really a good idea with some members on this forum?

We could do a staff run the only problem is deciding, which order to send it, Rons in india right now, and I live in the UK, same as you(only a few hours by train) so it would be stupid me sending it to Ron, then Ron sending it to you.

Thats true, I’d be up for that
[/quote]
If it gets sent to the States, it should be sent to me or Pwnd, since we live on the very eastern side, and he is only an hour away

Then Mopar is only one state over from me…[/quote]
I live on the East Coast too. Pwnd’s in NJ and I’m in Brooklyn. I say I get it first!

Read full topic
